title: Plant Stand, late 18th century
description: A) on six-footed base, animal-footed tripod with fluted center support; circular plant holder with guilloche and beading is joined to each tripod leg by bearded and horned goat head. B) Cicular mirror (modern) for rim of plant stand.

tombstone.epitaph: Plant Stand, late 18th century.gilt wood, mirror. 1968-151-1-a,b.
